Description: Rock crystal "molar flask"; four corner pieces carved with half palmettes which project below the body to form feet, one of which is missing; slightly flaring mouth with octagonal outer section; polished; top broken.
Funder name: Funded by: P T Brooke Sewell, Esq
Acquisition notes: Deposited in the Dept of Orental Antiquities, 22nd August 1957 (deposit book entry 3045).
